price: 71. Boye bazali kornona te ete kati ya maye maboko na biso masali, tokeli An‘âm(1) biye bazali kokonza?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِينَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا فَهُمۡ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
footnotes: 1 An’âm: Bótala suratu Fâtwir mokapo: 28, Bótala na Imrân mekapo: 14.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā khalaqnā lahum mimmā ʿamilat aydīnā anʿāman fahum lahā mālikūna
